title: How to Enlarge Emoji on WhatsApp

steps.title: Open WhatsApp.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp. It has a green icon with an outline of a white speech bubble with a phone in the middle. Tap the icon on your Home screen or Apps menu to open WhatsApp. If your WhatsApp account isn't verified on your phone, you'll first need to confirm your number before continuing.

steps.title: Tap Chats.
steps.content: Tap Chats . This tab is either at the bottom of the screen (iPhone) or at the top of the screen (Android). If WhatsApp opens to a conversation, first tap the "Back" button in the top-left corner of the screen to return to the main screen.

steps.title: Open a conversation.
steps.content: Open a conversation. Tap the name of the contact you are having a conversation with to open the conversation. Alternatively, you can tap the green icon with a text bubble and select a contact to start a new conversation.

steps.title: Tap the text box.
steps.content: Tap the text box. It's at the bottom of the screen. Doing so will bring up your phone's keyboard.

steps.title: Tap the emoji button.
steps.content: Tap the emoji button. On an iPhone, tap the smiley face in the lower-left corner of the keyboard. You may first have to press and hold the globe icon here to prompt the smiley face icon to show. On Android, either tap the smiley face icon on the keyboard or press and hold the "Enter" button.

steps.title: Post an emoji with no text.
steps.content: Post an emoji with no text. Tap an emoji to add it to the line of text. If you post an emoji with text, it will appear as it's normal size. However, there are three different sizes for emojis that are posted without text, depending on how many emojis you post at once. They are as follows: 1 emoji - Sending one emoji and nothing else will present the largest emoji possible. 2 emoji - Sending two emoji and nothing else will result in slightly smaller emoji than if you sent only one. 3 emoji - Sending three emoji and nothing else will result in emoji that are only slightly larger than emoji sent with accompanying text. 4 emoji and up - Sending four or more emoji will result in emoji that are the same size as they would be if you sent them with text.

steps.title: Tap the "Send" button .
steps.content: Tap the "Send" button . It's a paper plane-shaped icon on the far-right side of the text box, though some Android versions have a checkmark here instead. Doing so will send your enlarged emoji.

steps.title: Open WhatsApp.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp. It's a green app with a white outline of a speech bubble on it. If WhatsApp isn't verified on your phone, you'll first need to confirm your number before continuing.

steps.title: Tap Chats.
steps.content: Tap Chats . It is the first tab at the top of the screen. If WhatsApp opens to a conversation, first tap the "Back" button in the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Open a conversation.
steps.content: Open a conversation. Tap the name of the contact you are having a conversation with to open the conversation. Alternatively, you can tap the green icon with a text bubble and select a contact to start a new conversation.

steps.title: Tap the text box.
steps.content: Tap the text box. It's at the bottom of the screen; doing so will bring up your phone's keyboard.

steps.title: Tap the emoji button in the text field.
steps.content: Tap the emoji button in the text field. It's the icon that resembles a smiley face. It's on the left side of the text bar.

steps.title: Tap the Sticker icon.
steps.content: Tap the Sticker icon. It's the icon that resembles a sheet of paper. It's at the bottom of the list of emojis.

steps.title: Tap the +.
steps.content: Tap the + . It's at the top of the list of stickers on the right side of the screen. This displays a list of sticker packs that are available on your phone as well as additional sticker packs that are available.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Get More Stickers.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Get More Stickers . This displays WhatsApp sticker apps in the Google Play Store.

steps.title: Tap a sticker app that has emojis in it.
steps.content: Tap a sticker app that has emojis in it. This displays the information page for the app. It also displays options for downloading the app.

steps.title: Tap Install.
steps.content: Tap Install . This downloads the app to your iPhone or Android phone.

steps.title: Tap Open.
steps.content: Tap Open . Once the app finishes downloading, tap Open in the App Store or Google Play Store to open the store.

steps.title: Find a sticker pack you want to add to WhatsApp.
steps.content: Find a sticker pack you want to add to WhatsApp. Each app is going to be a little different. Some have categorized packs you can add to WhatsApp. Some may allow you to make your own pack by selecting which stickers you want to add. Find the option to add the sticker pack to WhatsApp and tap it.

steps.title: Return to your conversation on WhatsApp.
steps.content: Return to your conversation on WhatsApp. Tap WhatsApp on your Home screen and tap the conversation you were in.

steps.title: Open the stickers menu in the text field.
steps.content: Open the stickers menu in the text field. Tap the emoji icon next to the text field and then tap the sticker icon.

steps.title: Tap the sticker pack you just installed.
steps.content: Tap the sticker pack you just installed. This displays the stickers in the pack.

steps.title: Tap a sticker.
steps.content: Tap a sticker. This posts the sticker in the WhatsApp chat.

steps.title: Open the App Store .
steps.content: Open the App Store . It has a blue icon with a white capital "A". Tap the App Store icon on your Home screen to open the App Store.

steps.title: Search for sticker apps for WhatsApp.
steps.content: Search for sticker apps for WhatsApp. You can use apps to install new sticker packs for WhatsApp. Some apps are free and some have a fee. Use the following steps to search sticker apps for WhatsApp. Tap the Search icon. Tap the search bar. Type "Stickers for WhatsApp" in the search bar. Tap Search .

steps.title: Tap GET next to a stickers app you want to install.
steps.content: Tap GET next to a stickers app you want to install. This will install the app on your iPhone. Not all sticker apps have emoji stickers. You may need to try a few different apps to get all the stickers you want.

steps.title: Tap Open once the app is finished installing.
steps.content: Tap Open once the app is finished installing. This will open the app. Alternatively, you can tap the app icon on your Home screen to open the app.

steps.title: Add a sticker pack with emojis to WhatsApp.
steps.content: Add a sticker pack with emojis to WhatsApp. Each app is going to be a little different. Some have categorized packs you can add to WhatsApp. Some may allow you to make your own pack by selecting which stickers you want to add. Find the option to add the sticker pack to WhatsApp and tap it. Follow the instructions to add the sticker pack to WhatsApp.
